title: Girlfriend's account got banned for third party software
body:
My gf had her account ban for using third party software. Which is impossible as she was playing a net cafe and is level 19 or something barely plays only when I beg her too. Anyone know of anything that can be done about this?
TY

replies.body:
It's possible the account was compromised and 3rd party software was used by an intruder. Her best bet is to submit an account recovery ticket to player support: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

They'll ask a bunch of questions to verify ownership. These questions are largely a guide, any information that is unique to the account but not visible on the account is useful in this, but for such a young account it may be difficult to find enough information to verify ownership.
Thanks heaps! Yeah and she doesn't know much about the game too :/
